metadata.title: CVE-2015-6823 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The allocate_buffers function in libavcodec/alac.c in FFmpeg before 2.7.2does not initialize certain context data, which allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (segmentation violation) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via crafted Apple Lossless Audio Codec (ALAC)data.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
